Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate manukha kahida hai ki jadom maim mara javanga tam phira ji'unde karake kadhi'a javanga
Ki manukham nu yada nahim a'unda ki asim usa nu isa tom pahilam paida kita ate uha kujha vi nahim si
Isa la'i tere raba di sahu asim' zarura isanu ikatha karange ate saitanam nu vi, phira unham nu naraka de kaula isa tar'ham hazara karange ki uha godi'am bhara diga painage
Phira asim hareka varaga vicom unham lokam nu alaga karange, jihare rahimata de mukabale sabha tom zi'ada bagi bane ho'e sana
Ate tuhade vico' ko'i nahim jisa nu usa uparom laghana na hove. Iha tere raba la'i zaruri hai. Jihara pura ho ke rahega
Phira asim unham lokam nu baca lavange jihare darade sana ate zulamam nu usa vica diga ho'i'a chada devange

ate jadom unham nu sadi'am sapasata a'itam suna'i'am jandi'am hana tam uha inakara karana vale, imana vali'am nu kahide hana ki dovam varaga vica kihara sihatara halata vica hai ate kisa di sagata zi'ada cagi hai
Ate inham zi'ada sadhanam vali'am ate inham tom zi'ada prabhavasali sana

Akho, ki jihara bada bure raha te huda hai tam rahimana usa nu dhila dida hai. Ithom taka ki jadom uha usa ciza nu dekha lainage, jisa da inham nala va'ada kita ja riha hai. Sasarika afata jam ki'amata da dina tam inham nu pata laga javega ki kisa di halata baî€¼uri hai ate kisa da dhara kamazora hai
Ate alaha hada'ita te calana karana vali'am di sahi raha vica vadha karada hai ate baki rahina vale puna tuhade raba de nere fala de anusara sresata hana ate natije de anusara utama vi
Ki tusim usanu dekhi'a jisa ne sadi'am a'itam nu jhuthala'i'a ate kiha ki mainu sapati ate satana mila ke rahinage
Ki usa ne gaiba (gupata) vica jhaka ke dekhi'a hai jam usa ne alaha tom ko'i vacana lai li'a hai
Kade vi nahim jo kujha uha akhada hai usa nu asim likha lavange ate usa di saza vica vadha karange
Ate jinham cizam da uha da'avedara hai usa de asim varisa banange ate uha sade kola ikala avega
Ate unham ne alaha tom binham zi'adatara (apane) puja bana'e hana tam ki uha unham la'i saha'ika banana
Kade vi nahim, uha unham di ibadata tom inakara karanage ate unham de virodhi bana janage
